$interpreted: Juan-Yun: ...So, I see our guests are still here, just as Himawari reported.
Himawari: Juan-Yun, I told them so many times...!
Juan-Yun: I know. You're my most loyal servant. You're not to blame.
Himawari: Juan-Yun...
Juan-Yun: Himawari tells me one of the Aldric delegations has a matter to discuss with me. I'm all ears.
Ace: It's not me.
Tica: Me me me! I've got a word or two for ya!
Juan-Yun: Miss Tica?
Himawari: Stay back!
Tica: Milord, I wanna join the mission to seal away the monsters~
Juan-Yun: You... what?
Tica: Though I could never replace Headmaster Ceres, my knowledge of runes outshines that of any Easterner~
Tica: I just know I could be of great help~
Sione: ...So Miss Chevalier will stay. And you?
Elio: I want to go to Atlas. Now Father's gone, I'll have to visit the Feather Clan library myself if I'm going to discover any more leads.
Tica: I'll stay here alone. Elio's got work to do, and I wanna help close that void.
Tica: You could say I've been... chosen by fate~
Himawari: Hmph, speaking of runes, Li Hwa should know enough...
Tica: Li Hwa's super smart with runes, too, but she's too busy looking after Soohyeon and the Bewitchers right now~
Himawari: Guh...
Elio: ...You two don't seem surprised at all.
Sione: Oh, yeah, well that's because...
Ace: We both knew how things would end up after you two jumped into rescue mode and started clamoring after the Lord of the Qilins.
Elio: ...S-Sorry about that...
Bull Contestant: ...My Lord, may I say something?
Bull Contestant: With our homeland in such turmoil, I know you'd rather not rely on outsiders. And neither would I...!
Bull Contestant: ...But if these two humans hadn't stepped in with their runes, I fear we'd all have been wiped out...
Bull Contestant: If this young lass wants to stay behind and help, please, my Lord, do permit her!
Juan-Yun: Hmm...
Juan-Yun: Himawari, you were there, too. Were things really as dire as he says?
Himawari: ...It was just as he described it.
Juan-Yun: Then it's agreed. Miss Tica may stay and help with our campaign. However...
Tica: However?
Juan-Yun: However... I cannot allow you to go with the warriors. It's too dangerous. Should anything happen, the East would bear the responsibility.
Juan-Yun: Unless the Kingdom of the Sun can send somebody skilled enough to match our warriors and guarantee Miss Tica's safety, I must decline.
Ace: (He's just finding an excuse to save face with...)
Ace: (The team he's sending out there are the most elite warriors in all the East, how would we ever find someone to match them at such short notice—)
Sione: —I'll do it.
Ace: Sione!!
Sione: I believe my swordsmanship is equal to any of your warriors'. I'll act as Miss Chevalier's escort in the East.
Ace: (Sione, sweet little Sione...)
Bull Contestant: I've seen her in action. She'll do.
Ace: (My Sione, my cute lil' sis...)
Juan-Yun: You... sister to the envoy of Aldric?
Ace: (You're staying!? Here, with monsters crawling about all over the place!?)
Sione: Yes. I'm also—
Ace: I won't allow it! Never! Over my dead body!!
Tica: Huh!? Your face has turned blue, are you okay?
Sione: ...Brother...
Ace: This is a serious undertaking. Please, allow me to talk things over with her first. Sione and I will return in a moment.
Elio: ...I've never seen this side of Ace before...
Sione: Brother, please calm down...
Ace: ...Draw your sword.
Sione: What are you... Please, let me explain...
Ace: You needn't explain anything. I know exactly what you're thinking. Your mission is to oversee Elio Ceres' safety.
Ace: Now he's returning to the Kingdom of the Sun with me, you must think that it'll be fine for you not to accompany him.
Sione: ...Yes...
Ace: And out of consideration for our Queen and Kingdom, if you can help close the void here in the East, that'll be even better.
Ace: Tica Chevalier is just a common rune scholar, after all. There's no guarantee she wouldn't get herself into trouble here. But you're different.
Sione: ......
Ace: You're an Aldric, and daughter to one of the twelve noble houses. If you're here, at least you'd be able to ensure she doesn't suffer any neglect.
Ace: Have I spoken fairly for you?
Sione: ...You know me inside and out.
Sione: And for the sake of our family, our strength, and our loyalty to Queen and Kingdom, I'm your best choice.
Ace: I'd never make any choice that places you in danger!
Sione: Brother, you're letting a personal matter interfere...
Ace: You're my sister! Of course this is personal! There's nothing more to be said. Draw your sword. If you can best me, I'll let you stay.
Sione: ...Fine. If this is what it takes...
Ace: I won't let you win this time!
Ace: You've lost. Now, as I said...
Ace: ...Sione, you're... laughing?
Sione: Ahh... It's been so long since we've sparred together. I'm so happy, I can't stop myself...
Ace: I thought you didn't like training with me? If I'd known, I would have accompanied you, any time...
Sione: You misunderstood me. What I never liked was... when you always lost to me on purpose.
Sione: You've always shouldered the responsibilities of the Aldric family so seriously.
Sione: ...All I wanted was to become the kind of sister that would make you proud of me.
Ace: ...I guess I've lost, after all.
Sione: ...Ace?
Ace: You're right, you're the best card in my hand. But maybe it's time to let you go.
Sione: You mean... you'll let me stay!?
Ace: ...I want to be the kind of brother you can be proud of, too.
Ace: So, in my capacity as envoy of the Kingdom of the Sun, I agree to let you stay.
Sione: —Understood!
Sione: ...Thank you, Ace!
Ace: ...Just promise me you'll get back in one piece.

Juan-Yun, I told them so many times...!
I know. You're my most loyal servant. You're not to blame.

...But if these two humans hadn't stepped in with their runes, I fear we'd all have been wiped out...

Hmm...
Himawari, you were there, too. Were things really as dire as he says?
...It was just as he described it.
Then it's agreed. Miss Tica may stay and help with our campaign. However...
However?
However... I cannot allow you to go with the warriors. It's too dangerous. Should anything happen, the East would bear the responsibility.
Unless the Kingdom of the Sun can send somebody skilled enough to match our warriors and guarantee Miss Tica's safety, I must decline.
(He's just finding an excuse to save face with...)
(The team he's sending out there are the most elite warriors in all the East, how would we ever find someone to match them at such short notice—)
—I'll do it.
Sione!!
I believe my swordsmanship is equal to any of your warriors'. I'll act as Miss Chevalier's escort in the East.
(Sione, sweet little Sione...)
I've seen her in action. She'll do.
(My Sione, my cute lil' sis...)
You... sister to the envoy of Aldric?
(You're staying!? Here, with monsters crawling about all over the place!?)
Yes. I'm also—
I won't allow it! Never! Over my dead body!!
Huh!? Your face has turned blue, are you okay?
...Brother...
This is a serious undertaking. Please, allow me to talk things over with her first. Sione and I will return in a moment.
...I've never seen this side of Ace before...
Brother, please calm down...
...Draw your sword.
What are you... Please, let me explain...
You needn't explain anything. I know exactly what you're thinking. Your mission is to oversee Elio Ceres' safety.
Now he's returning to the Kingdom of the Sun with me, you must think that it'll be fine for you not to accompany him.
And out of consideration for our Queen and Kingdom, if you can help close the void here in the East, that'll be even better.
Tica Chevalier is just a common rune scholar, after all. There's no guarantee she wouldn't get herself into trouble here. But you're different.
You're an Aldric, and daughter to one of the twelve noble houses. If you're here, at least you'd be able to ensure she doesn't suffer any neglect.
Have I spoken fairly for you?
...You know me inside and out.
And for the sake of our family, our strength, and our loyalty to Queen and Kingdom, I'm your best choice.
I'd never make any choice that places you in danger!
Brother, you're letting a personal matter interfere...
You're my sister! Of course this is personal! There's nothing more to be said. Draw your sword. If you can best me, I'll let you stay.
...Fine. If this is what it takes...
I won't let you win this time!
You've lost. Now, as I said...
...Sione, you're... laughing?
Ahh... It's been so long since we've sparred together. I'm so happy, I can't stop myself...
I thought you didn't like training with me? If I'd known, I would have accompanied you, any time...
You misunderstood me. What I never liked was... when you always lost to me on purpose.
You've always shouldered the responsibilities of the Aldric family so seriously.
...All I wanted was to become the kind of sister that would make you proud of me.
...I guess I've lost, after all.
...Ace?
You're right, you're the best card in my hand. But maybe it's time to let you go.
You mean... you'll let me stay!?
...I want to be the kind of brother you can be proud of, too.
So, in my capacity as envoy of the Kingdom of the Sun, I agree to let you stay.
—Understood!
...Thank you, Ace!
...Just promise me you'll get back in one piece.

Please, let me explain...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You needn't explain anything. I know exactly what you're thinking. Your mission is to oversee Elio Ceres' safety.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_26_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Now he's returning to the Kingdom of the Sun with me, you must think that it'll be fine for you not to accompany him.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Yes...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And out of consideration for our Queen and Kingdom, if you can help close the void here in the East, that'll be even better.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_27_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Tica Chevalier is just a common rune scholar, after all. There's no guarantee she wouldn't get herself into trouble here. But you're different.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_27_003","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're an Aldric, and daughter to one of the twelve noble houses. If you're here, at least you'd be able to ensure she doesn't suffer any neglect.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Have I spoken fairly for you?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...You know me inside and out.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_29_001","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And for the sake of our family, our strength, and our loyalty to Queen and Kingdom, I'm your best choice.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_29_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'd never make any choice that places you in danger!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_29_003","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Brother, you're letting a personal matter interfere...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_29_004","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're my sister! Of course this is personal! There's nothing more to be said. Draw your sword. If you can best me, I'll let you stay.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Fine. If this is what it takes...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I won't let you win this time!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You've lost. Now, as I said...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Sione, you're... laughing?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ahh... It's been so long since we've sparred together. I'm so happy, I can't stop myself...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I thought you didn't like training with me? If I'd known, I would have accompanied you, any time...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_35_001","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You misunderstood me. What I never liked was... when you always lost to me on purpose.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You've always shouldered the responsibilities of the Aldric family so seriously.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_36_001","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...All I wanted was to become the kind of sister that would make you proud of me.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_36_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...I guess I've lost, after all.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_37_001","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Ace?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_37_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're right, you're the best card in my hand. But maybe it's time to let you go.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You mean... you'll let me stay!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_38_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...I want to be the kind of brother you can be proud of, too.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So, in my capacity as envoy of the Kingdom of the Sun, I agree to let you stay.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2014Understood!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_40_001","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Thank you, Ace!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_402_005_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Just promise me you'll get back in one piece.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
